casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Austin Lynn MILLER. No. 113P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 31, 2016. Jeffrey William Gillette, for Miller, Austin Lynn. *503Jill F. Cramer, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of March 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of March 2016."
